item.title: Episode 102: Serial Killers of World War II | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description We uncover the history of serial killing in Europe amidst the destruction of World War II, including Gordon Cummins, The Blackout Ripper, and Marcel Petoit, Doctor Satan himself! Transcript

item.title: Episode 101: Hate Week | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description The boys explore the world of hate groups from the KKK to the Nation of Islam to Holocaust deniers worldwide! Transcript

item.title: Episode 100: Bundy Part 2: Bones for Time | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description Our two part series on Ted Bundy concludes with the sheer brutality of his crimes in Tallahassee, his wonderful courtroom performance, and the myriad confessions that peppered his last days. Transcript

item.title: Episode 92: Black Serial Killers Part II: The Zebra Murders | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description Our series on black serial killers concludes with one of the most terrifying, bizarre, and under reported killing sprees in American history: the Zebra Murders. Transcript

item.title: Episode 93: Gnomes! | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description The wonderful moon experiences of gnomes are explored in all of their cuddly and evil Siberian glory! Transcript

item.title: Episode 94: Creepypasta V - Babybum | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description Halloween month kicks off with a collection of more of our favorite Creepypasta! Transcript

item.title: Episode 95: Listenerpasta | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description This one’s for you! We took calls and emails from our listeners telling us their creepiest and scariest real life stories involving ghosts, demons, serial killers, and, in the best email we’ve ever gotten, a secret government military base! Transcript

item.title: Episode 96: Call 911! | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description Our October series continues with an episode almost completely dedicated to horrifying 911 calls. Almost because there’s also a pedophile testimony thrown in there. Transcript

item.title: Episode 97: Movies of the Beast | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description Halloween month continues with a whole slew of Halloween movie recommendations plus an interview with Shane Morton, the makeup artist and special effects designer who made Henry the lovely demon he is on Your Pretty Face Is Going To Hell! Transcript

item.title: Episode 98: Hostage to the Devil | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description It’s an exorcism extravaganza as we detail the processes of possession and exorcism in detail and perform a real life seance right here in the studio! Transcript

item.title: Episode 99: Bundy | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description Our heavy hitters series begins with everyone’s favorite psycho killer ladies man, Ted Bundy! On the first of this two parter, we explore Bundy’s early life, his first series of murders, and his from two consecutive prison breaks. Transcript

item.title: Episode 91: Black Serial Killers Part 1: Call Me God | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description The vastly underreported phenomenon of African-American serial killers is discussed at length in this two part series. Today’s murderers: the Cleveland Strangler, the Grim Sleeper (including the other four serial killers operating in South Los Angeles at the time), and the Beltway Snipers. Transcript

item.title: Episode 88: The Vile Vortices | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description We explore the Vile Vortices of planet earth focusing mainly on everyone’s favorite disappearance zone: The Bermuda Triangle. Tune in to hear theories ranging from Pleadian space networks to Atlantean super weapons plus a thorough examination of Japan’s feared oceanographic anomaly: the Dragon’s Triangle! Transcript

item.title: Episode 89: Open Lines | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description This is it! We’re finally releasing our long awaited pilot on to the podcasting masses. Join us as we take calls from a man running a haunted hotel, an ER nurse who swears he can feel spirits leaving bodies, and woman who has had actual sexual intercourse with a ghost. Transcript

item.title: Episode 90: The Pleiadians and the Battle for Humanity | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description I’s an alien extravaganza as we explore the different sides of the conflict raging on earth between the malevolent forces of the Grays/Reptilians and the light beings known as the Pleiadians! Transcript

item.title: Episode 84: Unsolved Serial Murders Part 2: The Zodiac | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description Henry and Marcus almost lose their minds researching the Zodiac killer as Ben tries to hold it all together. Tune in for the hard facts of the murders and the dozens of theories surrounding what is possibly the most famous and fascinating of all unsolved serial murders in American history. Transcript

item.title: Episode 85: Witches: A History and Demonstration of Their Power | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description We explore the history of witches from sixteenth century England to modern day Africa plus a magical battle between the white magic forces of Henry and the Satanic forces of Marcus is held as Ben uses his powers to summon Matthew McConaughey to his Facebook page. Transcript

item.title: Episode 86: Spree Killers Pt. 1: If They Knew How Much Fun I Was Havin'... | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description Types 1-4 of spree killers and mass murderers are discussed, from Charles Starkweather’s two month, eleven victim rampage through Nebraska to Richard Speck’s deadly night with eight nursing students in 1966 and all the postal workers in between. Transcript

item.title: Episode 87: Spree Killers Pt. 2: I've Been Getting These Headaches... | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description We continue our coverage of America’s worst spree killers with the top men on campus: Charles Whitman, the deadly sniper who killed 16 and wounded 32 from the top of a clock tower at the University of Texas, and Seung-Hui Cho, the deeply troubled madman who rose to the top of America’s spree killer list with a body count of 32 while stalking the campus at Virginia Tech.

item.title: Episode 83: Unsolved Serial Murders Part 1: The Phantom, the Axe, and the Torso | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description In the first of a two part series, the boys examine cases of unsolved serial murders, including the Phantom of Texarkana, The Axeman of New Orleans, and the Cleveland Torso Murderer! Transcript

item.title: Episode 80: The Citizen's Hearing on Disclosure | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description The boys address the former Canadian Defense Secretary’s claims that there are four distinct species of aliens working with world governments and cover the Citizens Hearing on Disclosure, a recent three day event held in Vegas featuring some of the most credible witnesses yet gathered in one place. Transcript

item.title: Episode 81: Female Serial Killers | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description The psychology and motivations behind women who kill! From Elizabeth Bathory to Aileen Wournos, we explore the reasons behind the killing sprees of the fairer sex. Transcript

item.title: Episode 82: Secret Societies | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description The world of secret societies is revealed, from the Bilderberg Group to the Tri-Lateral Commision and ending in the place where all the elite go to play: Bohemian Grove. Transcript

item.title: Episode 74: Sex Dungeons | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description In light of the recent events in Cleveland, the boys explore a few of the sex dungeons of our past, including Josef Fritzl and a mysterious group of Australian men known only as The Family. Transcript

item.title: Episode 75: The Afterlife | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description A new documentary about the afterlife inspires the boys to dig deep into the world of near death experiences, particularly the people who went to hell instead of heaven. Transcript

item.title: Episode 76: Real-Life Vampires | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description Real-life vampires are exposed as the boys explore the cases of Marcus Wesson (cult leader responsible for nine deaths who believed Jesus Christ was a vampire), Andrei Chikatilo (Russian killer of 52 women and children) and Richard Chase (The Vampire of Sacramento, killer of six who bathed in their blood and ate his victims). Transcript

item.title: Episode 77: Japanese War Crimes | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description In one of our more disturbing episodes, we delve into what are arguably Japan’s worst among many war crimes: The Rape of Nanking and Unit 731. Transcript

item.title: Episode 78: Lord RayEl: The Messiah Has Arrived | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description The Second Coming of Jesus Christ is upon us! Join us as we hear the Good Word from Lord RayEl aka Raymond Elwood Howard-Lear, convicted felon and former candidate for mayor of Chicago. Transcript

item.title: Episode 79: Creepypasta IV - Then Who Was Phone? | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description The boys read some of their favorite creepypasta and listen to some hilarious 911 calls involving dead autistic children. Transcript

item.title: Episode 66: The Dark World of Internet Fetish Sites | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description Inspired by the NYC Cannibal Cop story, Ben, Henry, and Marcus explore the worlds of vore, gynophagia, and Cannibal Cop’s favorite site, Dark Fetish Net. We’ll also be discussing whether or not the cop was going to actually go through with his planned crimes. Transcript

item.title: Episode 67: Spectrophilia | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description Sexual themes continue as the boys discuss the topic of Spectrophilia (sex with ghosts) while blowing the lid off Chinese ghost weddings. Transcript

item.title: Episode 68: Satanic Ritual Abuse Part I: Burning In My Rectum | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description On this, the first of a two part episode, we explore the roots of the Satanic ritual abuse panic of the eighties going all the way back to the Bible and discuss the darker conspiratorial undertones of what real Satanic ritual abuse may actually be. Guaranteed to induce burning in your rectum. Transcript

item.title: Episode 69: Satanic Ritual Abuse Part II: Old Grandma Played the Piano | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description Our two part series on SRA concludes as the boys explore the McMartin Preschool case, Russ Dizdar’s one-man war against the forces of Satan, and how MK-Ultra and the Nazis tie into it all. Transcript

item.title: Episode 70: King of the Warlocks | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description We examine the world of cursed objects, from the Codex Gigas to mandrakes to the haunted objects one can find on the eBay. Transcript

item.title: Episode 71: The American Curse | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description Ben, Henry and Marcus talk Boston Marathon conspiracies, plus all the horrible disasters and mass killings surrounding the dates of April 15th - 20th in American history (total body count: 1,412) and how it all ties in to The Shot Heard Round The World Transcript

item.title: Episode 72: Alien Implants and Abductions | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description The lid gets blown off the world of alien implants and Henry talks about the horrible life of author and alien abductee Whitley Strieber. Transcript

item.title: Episode 73: Ley Lines, Dolphins, and the Indigo | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description The boys get a little new agey as they try to understand how sacred geometry and ley lines affect our reality, try a little dolphin meditation, and explore the hidden power behind the 33rd Parallel. Transcript

item.title: Episode 65: Creepypasta III - The Hamburgering | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description It’s creepypasta time again! Join us as we read stories about sentient severed heads, haunted children, and shared dream experiences. Plus! Henry gives us a report from LA about the Canadian tourist found in a hotel water tank and the creepy past of the hotel itself. Transcript

item.title: Episode 63: Bigfoot | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description The secrets of Bigfoot are revealed, including the infamous Patterson-Gimlin film, recent sightings of the Bigfoot, the possibility that they might be aliens, and the mystery of why everyone involved in Bigfoot research has horrible, terrible surnames. Transcript

item.title: Episode 64: Bonus Material: The Jonestown Death Tape | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description On this special bonus episode of Last Podcast: we present to you, in its entirety, the Jonestown Death Tape, starring the Reverend Jim Jones! Listen in to hear the last 45 minutes of 900 people’s lives. Needless to say, it is very disturbing. Transcript

item.title: Episode 61: The B.T.K. Killer Part Two: Detective Popcorn | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description The B.T.K. series comes to close as we cover his last few kills, how he got caught, and just how much of a terrible person in every respect that this guy is. Transcript

item.title: Episode 59: The B.T.K. Killer Part One: The Ball Game Explodes | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description We explore the career of one of America’s most frightening and depraved serial killers, Dennis Rader aka B.T.K. Strangler. On this, the first episode of a two part series, we start with his emergence in 1974 with the Otero family killings and continue until the beginning of his first hiatus after the murder of Nancy Fox in 1977. Transcript

item.title: Episode 56: A Maximillian LeBlanc Christmas | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description Join us one of the great masters of horror cinema, Maximillian Blanc (James Adomian), as he regales us with with a special Christmas recitation. Transcript

item.title: Episode 57: Jesus | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description In honor of the holiday season (which is now thankfully behind us), the boys explore the myth of Jesus and the three theories as to where the idea of the man came from. Lizards. Transcript

item.title: Episode 58: Cobra, The Light Aliens, and You | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description Henry explores his newest theory about the constant battle between the Reptilians who want to subjugate us and Codename: Cobra, the hero who represents the light aliens who only want the best for humankind and pyramids and crystals and the Queen of England plus yetis. Transcript

item.title: Episode 60: Serial Killer Fantasy Baseball Live | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description On this special bonus live episode of Last Podcast, the boys pick a fantasy baseball team stocked entirely with our favorite serial killers. Transcript

item.title: Episode 62: Thought Form Energy Ghosts | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description Henry skypes in from Los Angeles to give us updates on the Black Dahlia murder and to teach us about Tulpae, the imaginary ghost friends you can create in your spare time for fun and profit. Transcript

item.title: Episode 53: The Toybox Killer | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description David Parker Ray, one of America’s least known yet most brutal serial killers, has his sexually sadistic crimes explored by the boys. Transcript

item.title: Episode 50: 50th Episode Halloween Spooky Story Extravaganza! | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description On this special Halloween edition of Last Podcast: 4 of our friends come by to tell us the spookiest stories they’ve got the creep the hell outta ya when you’re alone at night! Transcript

item.title: Episode 51: Gucci and Dogs and HAARP | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description The boys explore the phenomenon of super-storms, from the (true) claim that Obama used HAARP to create Hurricane Sandy in an attempt to sway the election (WHICH WORKED) to macabre details of the great Galveston hurricane of 1900 in which 8000 souls perished. Transcript

item.title: Episode 52: Project MK-Ultra | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description Inspired by the Jimmy Saville BBC scandal, the boys explore the seedy world of the MK-Ultra program, including LSD experiments on mental patients, raping children for the purpose of creating super-spies, and the blackmailing of foreign dignitaries. Transcript

item.title: Episode 54: Curses | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description Henry returns from near death as we talk about all manner of curses, from Gypsy to Satanic to Biblical to Irish! Transcript

item.title: Episode 55: The Great Beast 666 | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description The boys explore the life of the Wickedest Man in the World and World Champion Power Bottom Aleister Crowley. Transcript

item.title: Episode 45: Demon Hunters | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description Demon hunters! They’re real and out for action! Join us as we read passages from The Field Guide to Demons, explore the world of people who think they’re in a constant battle with the forces of darkness, and discuss a trio of sexy sisters who perform exorcisms. Transcript

item.title: Episode 46: Cannibalism | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description The boys discuss famous cannibals throughout history, particularly everyone’s favorite, Mr. Albert Fish. Transcript

item.title: Episode 47: Origins of the Pyramids | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description The origins of the pyramids are revealed! Join us as we explore different theories as to how these impossible structures will built, plus secrets of the Curse of King Tut’s tomb are explored in depth. Surprisingly, it involves a canary. Transcript

item.title: Episode 48: 666: The List of the Beast | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description In honor of our favorite upcoming holiday, the boys give their top 6 horror movies each! Transcript

item.title: Episode 49: Haunted House Adventure | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description The boys go over the top five haunted houses in the world and take a trip to the famed Killers haunted house in New York City! Transcript

item.title: Episode 43: Occult Symbols | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description The boys explore the phenomenon of occult symbols in everyday life, Masonic numerology, and the facts behind the claim that the President is a Reptilian/Grey/Humanoid hybrid. Transcript

item.title: Episode 44: Creepypasta II - A Smattering of Creepy | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description Creepypasta returns! Today’s Last Podcast brings you that and more, including a particularly disturbing site called Normal Porn for Normal People, the East Side Rapist, and the mysterious disappearances in America’s national parks. Transcript

item.title: Episode 41: Our Psychic Powers | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description The boys test their psychic abilities. The results…are disturbing! Transcript

item.title: Episode 42: Ghost, Alien, or Molested? | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description The boys research ghost and alien stories on the internet to answer the burning question concerning most of them: was it a ghost or an alien, or their grandpa? Transcript

item.title: Episode 39: Hail Satan! | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description The boys explore the many facets of Satan and Satanism, including the origins of the myth, how extremely misinformed people are about the concept of Satanism, and Satanic clubs throughout the centuries. Transcript

item.title: Episode 40: The Alien Agenda | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description The boys explore the many facets of Satan and Satanism, including the origins of the myth, how extremely misinformed people are about the concept of Satanism, and Satanic clubs throughout the centuries. Transcript

item.title: Episode 35: There's Bones In The Chocolate | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description The boys explore the world of mentally challenged serial killers. Transcript

item.title: Episode 36: Sandwiches in the Matrix | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description Glitches in the matrix, masturbation sigils, and the writings of Philip K. Dick! Transcript

item.title: Episode 37: The Zombie Apocalypse is Upon Us | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description You’ve read the story of the face-eating man, now hear all the alarming facts surrounding the case! From the rash of mysterious happenings around Florida in the surrounding areas to the extreme effects of snorting bath salts, LPOTL is delving into the world of real-life zombies for your frightening pleasure. Transcript

item.title: Episode 38: Erratic Behavior | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description Our conversation of the impending apocalypse continues as new stories of cannibalism surface and previously covered stories reveal more disturbing details. Transcript

item.title: Episode 34: Heaven's Gate | Last Podcast On The Left
item.description: Podcast Description The boys explore the Heaven’s Gate incident and the man behind it all, Marshall Applewhite. Transcript
